trans-unit.source: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Representerer navigasjon og manipulering brukergrensesnittet (UI) for kontroller i et skjema som er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: The BindingNavigator control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen BindingNavigator representerer en standard måte å navigere og endre data i et skjema.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a BindingNavigator is paired with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> control to move through data records on a form and interact with them.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller en BindingNavigator som er forbundet med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>kontrollen for å flytte datapostene i et skjema og samhandle med dem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is set to the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> component that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>-egenskap er satt til den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName>komponent som fungerer som en datakilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the BindingNavigator control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data.
trans-unit.target: Som standard BindingNavigator kontrollens brukergrensesnittet (UI) består av en rekke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>knapper, tekstbokser og statisk tekstelementer for vanligste data relatert handlinger, for eksempel å legge til data, slette data og navigering gjennom dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the BindingNavigator control.
trans-unit.target: Hvert enkelt av disse kontrollene kan hentes eller angis via et tilknyttede medlem kontrollens BindingNavigator.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte det er også et en samsvar til medlemmer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>klassen som utfører de samme funksjonene programmatisk som vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: |UI Control|BindingNavigator member|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> member| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**Move First**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>| |**Move Previous**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A>| |**Current Position**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>| |**Count**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>| |**Move Next**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>| |**Move Last**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>| |**Add New**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>| |**Delete**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>| Adding a BindingNavigator control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, will automatically establish the relationships in this table.
trans-unit.target: | UI-kontroll | BindingNavigator medlem | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>medlem | |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Først**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>| | **Flytte tidligere**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A>| | **Gjeldende posisjon**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>| | **Count**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>| | **Move Next**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>| | **Move Last**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>| | **Add New**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>| | **Delete**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>| Legge til en BindingNavigator kontroll i et skjema og binding til en datakilde som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, automatisk oppretter relasjonene i denne tabellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar: - Create the BindingNavigator with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en av disse metodene til å tilpasse denne verktøylinjen:-opprette BindingNavigator med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>konstruktør som godtar en boolsk verdi `addStandardItems` parameter, og angi denne parameteren `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Then add the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Legg til den ønskede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>objekter til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: - If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from BindingNavigator and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method to define additional or alternate standard items.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis det er mye tilpassing ønskes, eller egendefinerte utformingen skal brukes, avledet en klasse fra BindingNavigator og overstyring av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metode til å definere ekstra eller alternative standard elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Standard konstruktør angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor with a parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, tilsvarer kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>konstruktør med en parameterverdi for `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: You can add the standard items by making a separate call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til elementer som standard av separate ringer til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class, indicating whether to display the standard navigation user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> -klassen som angir om du vil vise standard navigasjon-brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.
trans-unit.target: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the standard navigational UI; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis standard navigering Brukergrensesnittet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class and adds this new instance to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> klasse og legger til denne ny forekomst i den angitte beholderen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control and adding it to a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, er angitt som en tjeneste, å kombinere trinnene for å opprette en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontroll og legge den til en overordnet <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Like the default constructor, it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.
trans-unit.target: Som Standardkonstruktøren, settes den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null` og viser ikke standard brukergrensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> to add the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> control to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> å legge til den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> styre til.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> as the data source.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> som datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bruker den `BindingSource` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til settet med navigering knapper og angir tilsvarende egenskapene, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> også

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> used as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> brukes som en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som representerer den **Legg til ny** knappen.

trans-unit.source: When set, the AddNewItem property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger, egenskapen AddNewItem genererer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelsesbehandlingen for den **Legg til ny** knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsesbehandlingen kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>metoden når den **Legg til ny** ble brukt på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `null` hvis den ikke ble satt og det brukes før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>implisitt eller eksplisitt-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Add New** button if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen deaktiverer den **Legg til ny** button hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null` eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en kontroll av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> i standard implementering

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Add New** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som representerer den **Legg til ny** button for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Legger til settet med navigasjonselementer som i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The AddStandardItems method adds the standard set of user interface <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddStandardItems legger til settet med brukergrensesnittet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>objekter til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>verktøyet stripe for grunnleggende navigering operasjoner, for eksempel **flytte første**, **flytte siste**, og **Legg til ny**.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Override AddStandardItems in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre AddStandardItems i avledede klasser til å definere verktøyet ekstra eller alternative stripe elementer.

trans-unit.source: To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å sikre optimale utformingen støtte for den utledede klassen, kontroller at hvert element har en betydning verdi i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable.
trans-unit.target: Under utformingen brukes dette til å generere et unikt navn for variabelen tilsvarende medlem.

trans-unit.source: The item's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable.
trans-unit.target: Elementets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>egenskapen oppdateres for å samsvare med navnet på medlemmet variabelen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, but does set new values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden ikke uttrykkelig fjerner tidligere eksisterende elementer fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, men angir nye verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Also AddStandardItems does not suspend layout while items are being added.
trans-unit.target: AddStandardItems hvilemodus også ikke oppsettet når elementer legges.

trans-unit.source: Disables updates to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> during the component's initialization.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiverer oppdateringer i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> kontrollerer av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> under initialisering av komponentens.

trans-unit.source: The BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: BeginInit og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>metoder Tillat den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen til å optimalisere endringene til flere egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Bruker dette paret av metodene, kan du starte avhengige av andre egenskaper eller bunke angi flere egenskaper på utformingstidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Call the BeginInit method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden BeginInit for å signalisere kontrollen som initialisering starter. Kall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>metoden signalisere at initialiseringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> component that is the source of data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> komponent som er datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource property represents the data source that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> navigates through.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource egenskapen representerer dataene kildetabellen som det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>navigerer via.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: More specifically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> represents the actual data list.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>representerer den faktiske datalisten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardegenskap for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> component associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> komponent som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the total number of items in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som viser totalt antall elementer i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CountItem property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CountItem `null` hvis den ikke ble satt og det brukes før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>implisitt eller eksplisitt-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The count of items is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som er tilgjengelig via <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en kontroll av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> i standard implementering

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the total number of items in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som viser totalt antall elementer i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string used to format the information displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som brukes til å formatere informasjonen som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> control is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> that displays the total number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>Kontrollen er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>som viser totalt antall elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CountItemFormat property is the format string used to format the count.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CountItemFormat er Formatstrengen som brukes til å formatere antallet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about format strings, see the <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om formatstrenger i <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The format <xref:System.String> used to format the item count.
trans-unit.target: Formatet <xref:System.String>brukes til å formatere elementantall.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is the string "of {0}".
trans-unit.target: Standarden er tekststrengen "{0}".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that is associated with the **Delete** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som er knyttet til den **slette** funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger, genererer for denne egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelsesbehandlingen for den **slette** knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsesbehandlingen kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>metoden når den **slette** ble brukt på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `null` hvis den ikke ble satt og det brukes før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>implisitt eller eksplisitt-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property is 0, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen deaktiverer den **slette** for følgende betingelser kjøretid: den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>egenskapen er 0, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en kontroll av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> i standard implementering

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Delete** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som representerer den **slette** button for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Enables updates to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> after the component's initialization has concluded.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer oppdateringer i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> kontrollerer av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> etter komponentens initialisering er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>og EndInit metoder Tillat den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen til å optimalisere endringene til flere egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Bruker dette paret av metodene, kan du starte avhengige av andre egenskaper eller bunke angi flere egenskaper på utformingstidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the EndInit method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>metoden signalisere kontrollen som initialisering starter; Kall metoden EndInit til signalisere at initialiseringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som er knyttet til den **flytte første** funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Move First** button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger, genererer for denne egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelsesbehandlingen for den **flytte første** knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> method when the **Move First** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsesbehandlingen kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>metoden når den **flytte første** ble brukt på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `null` hvis den ikke ble satt og det brukes før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>implisitt eller eksplisitt-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move First** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is zero, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> for the related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen deaktiverer den **flytte første** for følgende betingelser kjøretid: den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er null, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>er `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move Last** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen deaktiverer den **flytte siste** for følgende betingelser kjøretid: den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null` eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>egenskapen er større enn eller lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move Next** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen deaktiverer den **flytte neste** for følgende betingelser kjøretid: den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null` eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>egenskapen er større enn eller lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A> method when the **Move Previous** button is clicked at run time.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontrollen deaktiverer den **flytte tidligere** for følgende betingelser kjøretid: den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>egenskapen `null` eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>egenskapen er mindre enn eller lik 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> event, the OnRefreshItems method performs the following operations against the state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til å heve den tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems>hendelsen metoden OnRefreshItems utfører følgende operasjoner mot tilstanden til den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems>

trans-unit.source: - Sets the internal members using the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: -Angir de interne medlemmene ved å bruke gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: - Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: – Aktiverer eller deaktiverer elementer i brukergrensesnittet (UI) etter gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: - Updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Oppdateringer av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnRefreshItems method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnRefreshItems kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the current position within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som viser gjeldende plassering i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, the PositionItem property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: I standard implementering PositionItem-egenskap som er av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `null` hvis den ikke ble satt og det brukes før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>implisitt eller eksplisitt-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position calculated by obtaining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende posisjon beregnes ved henting av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, og legge til 1 for å transformeringen posisjonen i en 1-baserte count.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer en kontroll av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> i standard implementering

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the current position.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> som viser gjeldende posisjon.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når tilstanden til navigering brukergrensesnittet (UI) må oppdateres til gjenspeiler gjeldende tilstand for de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshItems event signals that the navigational UI of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen RefreshItems signaliserer som navigering Brukergrensesnittet for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>må oppdateres for å vise gjeldende status for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardhendelsen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer tilstanden til standard elementene som skal gjenspeiler gjeldende tilstand for dataene.

trans-unit.source: If you have overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> in a derived class, you should also override RefreshItemsCore to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har overstyrt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>i en avledet klasse, må du også overstyre RefreshItemsCore for å oppdatere egendefinerte standard elementer du har lagt til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Causes form validation to occur and returns whether validation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at skjemavalidering skal utføres, og returnerer om valideringen var vellykket.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å bekrefte fokus kan gå før du utfører handlingen Klikk for et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation was successful and focus can shift to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis valideringen var vellykket og fokus kan bytte til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
